message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my premium product to you for $1400000. This product is highly valuable and I believe it will be a great asset to you. Are you interested in this offer?

Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of your product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Would you consider selling the product for $1100000? Looking forward to your response.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your budget constraints, but I believe the value of the product warrants a higher price. Would you consider meeting me in the middle at $1250000? This way, we both make some concessions.
